attributes.value: / A simple library for coloring terminal and terminal text graphics control.\
/ It uses ANSI control sequences for setting colors and effects, tested only on MacOS.\
/ Some of the features in effect controls may not be supported in some systems or some terminal emulators.
/     // Setting Foreground color and background color simply.
/     println!("And now the background is yellow.");
/     println!("Why don't use bright green and look like a hacker in a film?");
/     println!("Walls of my terminal is my favourite color!");
/     println!("This text is color 123 of 256 colors.");
/     // Reverse the foreground with background and make your eyes dazzle
/     // Let's return to our black terminal, white theme sucks
/     // Make texts invisible and surprise your friend
/     // No need to close and open a new terminal
/     // Strike the last item on your to do list
/     // Or turn all of the effects and colors off at the same time
/ This project is distributed under MIT license.

defs.name: Color256
defs.docs: The color in 256 colors.

defs.name: ColorRGB
defs.docs: The color of given R, G, B values.

attributes.value: / The color of given R, G, B values.

defs.name: Color
defs.value:
pub enum Color {
    Black,
    Red,
    Green,
    Yellow,
    Blue,
    Magenta,
    Cyan,
    White,
    BrightBlack,
    BrightRed,
    BrightGreen,
    BrightYellow,
    BrightBlue,
    BrightMagenta,
    BrightCyan,
    BrightWhite,
    Color256(u8),
    ColorRGB(u8, u8, u8),
}
defs.docs: The enum includes the default 4-bit colors, bright colors, 256 colors and RGB colors.

attributes.value: / The enum includes the default 4-bit colors, bright colors, 256 colors and RGB colors.

defs.name: reset_all
defs.docs: Resets all the graphical effects and colorings.

attributes.value: / Resets all the graphical effects and colorings.

defs.name: bold
defs.docs: Sets the terminal font bold.

defs.name: faint
defs.docs: Makes the faint effect, decreases the density of colors.

attributes.value: / Makes the faint effect, decreases the density of colors.

defs.name: italic
defs.docs: Makes the terminal font italic.

defs.name: underline
defs.docs: Makes the text underlined.

defs.name: blink
defs.docs: Turns on the blink effect.

defs.name: fast_blink
defs.docs: Turns on the rapid blink effect.

attributes.value: / Turns on the rapid blink effect.

defs.name: reverse
defs.docs: Switches the background color and the foreground color.

attributes.value: / Switches the background color and the foreground color.

defs.name: blink_off
defs.docs: Turns the blink/rapid blink effect off.

attributes.value: / Turns the blink/rapid blink effect off.

defs.name: reverse_off
defs.docs: Turns the reverse effect off.

defs.name: invisible
defs.docs: Makes the text invisible.

defs.name: invisible_off
defs.docs: Makes the text appear if invisible.

attributes.value: / Makes the text appear if invisible.

defs.name: reset_fg
defs.docs: Resets the foreground color to default.

attributes.value: / Resets the foreground color to default.

defs.name: reset_bg
defs.docs: Resets the background color to default.

attributes.value: / Resets the background color to default.

defs.name: bold_and_faint_off
defs.docs: Turns the bold and faint effects off.

attributes.value: / Turns the bold and faint effects off.

defs.name: underline_off
defs.docs: Turns off the underlining.

defs.name: italic_off
defs.docs: Turns off italic font.

defs.name: strike
defs.docs: Strikes the text.

defs.name: strike_off
defs.docs: Turns off the strike effect.

defs.name: make_colored_fg
defs.docs: Returns the given text's foreground dyed with color given.

attributes.value: / Returns the given text's foreground dyed with color given.

defs.name: make_colored_bg
defs.docs: Returns the given text's background dyed with the color given.

attributes.value: / Returns the given text's background dyed with the color given.

defs.name: make_bold
defs.docs: Makes the text given bold.

defs.name: make_faint
defs.docs: Applies the faint effect on the text given.

attributes.value: / Applies the faint effect on the text given.

defs.name: make_italic
defs.docs: Makes the text given italic.

defs.name: make_underlined
defs.docs: Makes the text given underlined.

defs.name: make_reversed
defs.docs: Switches the background and foreground colors of the text given.

attributes.value: / Switches the background and foreground colors of the text given.

defs.name: make_invisible
defs.docs: Makes the text given invisible.

defs.name: make_striked
defs.docs: Makes the text given striked.

defs.name: set_fg

attributes.value: / Sets the foreground color of the terminal.

defs.name: set_bg

attributes.value: / Sets the background color of the terminal.
